document.full_text: the red river edged toward an expected crest on saturday, when rain was predicted for the region that has been fortified against flooding by miles of sandbags, reinforced dikes and other protective measures.
document.title: red river nears prolonged crest at fargo, north dakota
lines_and_colors: the red river edged toward an expected crest on saturday, when rain was predicted for the region that has been fortified against flooding by miles of sandbags, reinforced dikes and other protective measures.
